name: XRRenderState.depthFar
description: The depthFar read-only property of the XRRenderState interface returns the distance in meters of the far clip plane from the viewer.
content:
Draft
This page is not complete.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The depthFar read-only property of the XRRenderState interface returns the distance in meters of the far clip plane from the viewer.
